title: KIDSPLAY
content:
This is a very preliminary typeface. It is meant to be viewed as a very quarky with slight imperfections. I'm trying to create dept by illustrations and charactors placed differently on the baseline.   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017082015im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/7561.jpg)
author: jlybear

comments.content:
Eat cotton candy during a cruise down the tornado slide while singing the ABC's with Elmo!   
   
All your hard illustrative work has paid off Jill, The actual letter forms you have created work very well with the figures. Sooooooooper Job!   
This post was brought to you by the letter M!

Here is a larger version, including numbers....   
The numbers are meant not to look directly related to the letters, but to look as though it is extended family.

Could view until downloaded and fixed the extension.   
   
Here's a gif. ![COME PLAY WITH ME](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017082015im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/8360.gif)
